name: The Souvenir
description: A young film student in the early '80s becomes romantically involved with a complicated and untrustworthy man.

review.author: loveblackpoem
review.heading: Shockingly anti-climatic
review.reviewBody: Quite early on I could tell what was going on in the film. I even had a guess at what the end would be. Despite this, I continued watching expecting more, something big, something shocking and I never really got it. The director does a great job at showing the ins and outs of a toxic relationship, however, it's just not enough.

keywords: london england,film school,man undresses,sex scene,male nudity
